EarlyStoppingCallback doesn't work correctly with minimize=False.
 The problem is in the following snippet:
         if minimize:
             self.is_better = lambda score, best: score <= (best - min_delta)
         else:
             self.is_better = lambda score, best: score >= (best - min_delta)
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/catalyst-team/catalyst/blob/master/catalyst/dl/callbacks/misc.py#L28>https://github.com/catalyst-team/catalyst/blob/master/catalyst/dl/callbacks/misc.py#L28</denchmark-link>
 
 I guess this is a typo or copypaste mistake, and for minimize=False it should be
 self.is_better = lambda score, best: score >= (best + min_delta)
 (plus instead of minus)
